title: I need to recover my PBE acc and i've tried to use RIOT Support but they say i need more detail
body: Any Riot Employees plz help me i signed up for pbe a LONG TIME AGO and i checked a couple days ago and i finally got it but i dont know what is the acc is. I dont know any of the info for the acc. Can you plz help me and if you can see what i set it as my summoner name is PWK

replies.body: Sensitive account issues are best addressed individually through your [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our account team can continue to assist you as best they can.  Best of luck!
